title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Sequel & Crisis Core Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.17.22
description:
Go to http://shopify.com/kfgames to get a free 14-day trial. 

Go to http://athleticgreens.com/kindafunny to get a free 1-year supply of Vitamin D and 5 free travels packs with your first purchase.

Blessing and Janet talk all about Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, Crisis Core Final Fantasy 7 Reunion, Dragon's Dogma, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:45 - Housekeeping
New Merch! kindafunny.com/store
A new PSILY XOXO is live and it’s all about Last of Us Part 1 and our deeper thoughts on it. You can catch that right now on Youtube.com/KindaFUnnyGames and on podcast services around the globe
A new Kinda Funny Podcast is LIVE and we decide what the OFFICIAL drink of Kinda Funny is!
The Roper Report   -
00:09:27 - We got a WHOLE bunch of FF7 news!
00:27:49 - Capcom is developing a Dragon’s Dogma sequel
00:30:55 -  Ad
00:33:12 - Activision Blizzard internal review finds "no evidence" it ignored harassment
00:38:38 - Epic launches cross-play tools for Steam and Epic Games Store
00:46:01 - Housemarque wants to put canned Returnal ideas into its next game
00:52:01 - Out today
00:56:54 - You‘re Wrong

epic games has announced a new crossplay tool that'll let developers connect their games and communities across different storefronts and platforms as it stands two players that own the same game on two different storefronts cannot play with each other with this tool developers can enable cross-play across two services in a blog post epic also said the tool will also let players roll their friends friends list across multiple platforms into one single list as well as as well as offer search tools uh and game invites across the two launchers the tool currently works between the epic game store and steam but console and mobile functionality is also in the works quote crossplay gives all friends the opportunities the opportunity to play to come together and create fond memories across interactive experiences said epic senior director of online services simon alles we are in the fortunate position to drive change in the industry with crossplay tools for all developers and we believe that
